text: Katha Ankahee () is an upcoming Indian television drama series based on the One Thousand and One Nights, better known as Arabian Nights. It is the remake of Kanal D's popular Turkish soap opera Binbir Gece. It started on 5 December 2022 on Sony Entertainment Television, and stars Aditi Sharma and Adnan Khan in the titular lead role. It ended on 1 December 2023. ==Cast== * Adnan Khan as Viaan * Aditi Sharma as Katha ==Production== ===Development=== The series was announced in October 2022 by Sony Entertainment Television. ===Release=== The teaser of the series was released on 14 October 2022. ==References== == Other websites == * Katha Ankahee on Instagram * Katha Ankahee on YouTube Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2020s drama television series Category:2020s Indian television series Category:2022 Indian television series debuts Category:2023 Indian television series endings
title: Katha Ankahee
